import pandas as pd
csv_file = "/Users/nvtrang/code/h2o/protocol-liquidity/data/staking_rewards_balances.csv"

xPSDN_ETH1_staking_balances = pd.read_csv(csv_file, index_col=0)
xPSDN_ETH1_staking_balances[["balance"]].apply(pd.to_numeric)

xPSDN_ETH1_staking_balances = xPSDN_ETH1_staking_balances.loc[xPSDN_ETH1_staking_balances["balance"] > 0]
xPSDN_ETH1_staking_balances.sort_values(by=["balance"], ascending=False).reset_index(drop=True)

title: psdnOcean Dashboard
text:
Code
# libs
import os
import pandas as pd
import warnings
import plotly.io as pio
import plotly.graph_objects as go
warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")
os.chdir('../')
from notebooks.utils.load_data import logs_table_from_etherscan

# contract addresses
psdn_ocean_contract_address = '0x51Fa2efd62ee56a493f24AE963eAce7D0051929E'.lower()
ocean_reward_lp_staking_contract_address = '0x08D3f2cAe4eaCDCbFb0f7FfaD07a6d00FC36Db6E'.lower() # psdnOcean-ocean lp
ocean_reward_psdn_ocean_staking_contract_address = '0xEb1CEFa6F175B4c889582DFEea4ee155CCD5D2A5'.lower()

title: psdnOcean Dashboard
text:
1 psdnOCEAN minting and usages


Code
total_psdn_ocean_minted = psdn_ocean_minting_txns['amount'].sum()
print(f"Total psdnOcean minted: {round(total_psdn_ocean_minted)}")


Total psdnOcean minted: 2058264




Code
fig = go.Figure()
pio.renderers.default = "plotly_mimetype+notebook"

_df = psdn_ocean_minting_txns.groupby(pd.Grouper(key='DateTime', freq='W'))['amount'].sum().reset_index()
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=_df['DateTime'], y=_df['amount'],
                    mode='lines',
                    name='psdnOcean minted'))

_df = psdn_ocean_lping_txns.groupby(pd.Grouper(key='DateTime', freq='W'))['amount'].sum().reset_index()#['To'].value_counts()
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=_df['DateTime'], y=_df['amount'],
                    mode='lines',
                    name='psdnOcean join LP'))

_df = psdn_ocean_staking_txns.groupby(pd.Grouper(key='DateTime', freq='W'))['amount'].sum().reset_index()#['To'].value_counts()
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=_df['DateTime'], y=_df['amount'],
                    mode='lines',
                    name='psdnOcean stake'))

# Edit the layout
fig.update_layout(title='psdnOcean flow weekly',
                   xaxis_title='Day',
                   yaxis_title='Amount', 
                   autosize=True,
                    # width=1000,
                    # height=600,
    )
fig.show()

title: psdnOcean Dashboard
text:
2 Ocean rewards to stakers


Code
pd.options.display.max_colwidth = 100




Code
# LP staking, ocean reward
ocean_reward_lp_staking_logs  = logs_table_from_etherscan(ocean_reward_lp_staking_contract_address)
ocean_reward_lp_staking_logs[['topic0','topic1']] = ocean_reward_lp_staking_logs.topics.apply(pd.Series)
ocean_reward_lp_staking = ocean_reward_lp_staking_logs.loc[
    # lp_staking['topic0'] == lp_staking['topic0'].unique()[0] # stake
    # lp_staking['topic0'] == lp_staking['topic0'].unique()[1] # withdraw
    # lp_staking['topic0'] == lp_staking['topic0'].unique()[2] # earmarkRewards
    ocean_reward_lp_staking_logs['topic0'] == '0x8e0d3fa908fd7ee819155b3ce71e292b601bbeb0cd00d7758b9d226a523cb827' # RewardPaid
]
ocean_reward_lp_staking['reward_amount'] = ocean_reward_lp_staking["data"].str.slice(stop=66).apply(int, base=16)/1e18
ocean_reward_lp_staking['reward_token'] = ocean_reward_lp_staking["data"].str.slice(start=67) # should yield ocean contract address only

# psdnOcean staking, ocean reward
ocean_reward_psdn_ocean_staking_logs  = logs_table_from_etherscan(ocean_reward_psdn_ocean_staking_contract_address)
ocean_reward_psdn_ocean_staking_logs[['topic0','topic1']] = ocean_reward_psdn_ocean_staking_logs.topics.apply(pd.Series)
ocean_reward_psdn_ocean_staking = ocean_reward_psdn_ocean_staking_logs.loc[
    ocean_reward_psdn_ocean_staking_logs['topic0'] == '0x8e0d3fa908fd7ee819155b3ce71e292b601bbeb0cd00d7758b9d226a523cb827' # RewardPaid
]
ocean_reward_psdn_ocean_staking['reward_amount'] = ocean_reward_psdn_ocean_staking["data"].str.slice(stop=66).apply(int, base=16)/1e18
ocean_reward_psdn_ocean_staking['reward_token'] = ocean_reward_psdn_ocean_staking["data"].str.slice(start=67) # should yield ocean contract address only




Code
total_lp_staking_ocean_rewards = ocean_reward_lp_staking['reward_amount'].sum()
print(f"Total Ocean rewards for lp stakers: {round(total_lp_staking_ocean_rewards)}")

total_psdn_ocean_staking_ocean_rewards = ocean_reward_psdn_ocean_staking['reward_amount'].sum()
print(f"Total Ocean rewards for psdnOcean stakers: {round(total_psdn_ocean_staking_ocean_rewards)}")


Total Ocean rewards for lp stakers: 67193
Total Ocean rewards for psdnOcean stakers: 20511




Code
# Create traces
fig = go.Figure()

_df = ocean_reward_lp_staking.groupby(pd.Grouper(key='DateTime', freq='W'))['reward_amount'].sum().reset_index()

fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=_df['DateTime'], y=_df['reward_amount'],
                    mode='lines',
                    name='To LP stakers'))

_df = ocean_reward_psdn_ocean_staking.groupby(pd.Grouper(key='DateTime', freq='W'))['reward_amount'].sum().reset_index()

fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=_df['DateTime'], y=_df['reward_amount'],
                    mode='lines',
                    name='To psdnOcean stakers'))

# Edit the layout
fig.update_layout(title='Ocean rewards to stakers weekly',
                   xaxis_title='Day',
                   yaxis_title='Amount', 
                   autosize=True,
                    # width=1000,
                    # height=600,
    )
fig.show()

title: psdnOcean Dashboard

3 Psdn rewards to stakers


Code
# LP staking, psdn reward
psdn_reward_lp_staking_logs  = logs_table_from_etherscan('0x2337e518542Db50da49F686fE3DB883908C3a517')
psdn_reward_lp_staking_logs[['topic0','topic1']] = psdn_reward_lp_staking_logs.topics.apply(pd.Series)
psdn_reward_lp_staking = psdn_reward_lp_staking_logs.loc[
    psdn_reward_lp_staking_logs['topic0'] == '0xe2403640ba68fed3a2f88b7557551d1993f84b99bb10ff833f0cf8db0c5e0486' # RewardPaid
]
psdn_reward_lp_staking['reward_amount'] = psdn_reward_lp_staking["data"].apply(int, base=16)/1e18

# psdnOcean staking, psdn reward
psdn_reward_psdn_ocean_staking_logs  = logs_table_from_etherscan('0x5c87da6a4947b49842c33a82bc30bac3a6811e64')
psdn_reward_psdn_ocean_staking_logs[['topic0','topic1']] = psdn_reward_psdn_ocean_staking_logs.topics.apply(pd.Series)
psdn_reward_psdn_ocean_staking = psdn_reward_psdn_ocean_staking_logs.loc[
    psdn_reward_psdn_ocean_staking_logs['topic0'] == '0xe2403640ba68fed3a2f88b7557551d1993f84b99bb10ff833f0cf8db0c5e0486' # RewardPaid
]
psdn_reward_psdn_ocean_staking['reward_amount'] = psdn_reward_psdn_ocean_staking["data"].apply(int, base=16)/1e18




Code
total_lp_staking_psdn_rewards = psdn_reward_lp_staking['reward_amount'].sum()
print(f"Total psdn rewards for lp stakers: {round(total_lp_staking_psdn_rewards)}")
total_psdn_ocean_staking_psdn_rewards = psdn_reward_psdn_ocean_staking['reward_amount'].sum()
print(f"Total psdn rewards for psdnOcean stakers: {round(total_psdn_ocean_staking_psdn_rewards)}")


Total psdn rewards for lp stakers: 3661
Total psdn rewards for psdnOcean stakers: 5564




Code
fig = go.Figure()
_df = psdn_reward_lp_staking.groupby(pd.Grouper(key='DateTime', freq='W'))['reward_amount'].sum().reset_index()

fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=_df['DateTime'], y=_df['reward_amount'],
                    mode='lines',
                    name='To LP stakers'))

_df = psdn_reward_psdn_ocean_staking.groupby(pd.Grouper(key='DateTime', freq='W'))['reward_amount'].sum().reset_index()

fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=_df['DateTime'], y=_df['reward_amount'],
                    mode='lines',
                    name='To psdnOcean stakers'))

# Edit the layout
fig.update_layout(title='PSDN rewards to stakers weekly',
                   xaxis_title='Day',
                   yaxis_title='Amount', 
                   autosize=True,
    )
fig.show()

title: psdnOcean Dashboard
text:
5 Number of psdnOcean minting txns


Code
# all minting txns
# psdn_ocean_deposit = psdn_ocean_transfers.loc[(psdn_ocean_transfers["From"] == "0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000")]


s = psdn_ocean_minting_txns['DateTime']
df = s.groupby(s.dt.floor('d')).size().reset_index(name='count')

# Create figure
fig = go.Figure()

fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=df['DateTime'], y=df['count'],
                    mode='markers',
                    name='To LP stakers'))

# Edit the layout
fig.update_layout(title='Number of psdnOcean minting txns',
                   xaxis_title='Day',
                #    yaxis_title='Amount', 
                   autosize=True,
                    # width=1000,
                    # height=600,
    )
fig.show()
